# Introduction  

This is the readable version that showcases analyses using BirdNET to carry out automated identification of bird species that participate in mixed-species flocks.     

## Attribution  

Please contact the following in case of interest in the project.  

- Vijay Ramesh (repo maintainer)
    - Postdoctoral Research Associate, Cornell Lab of Ornithology  

## Data access  

The data used in this work will be archived on Zenodo.
